game.name: Vampire: The Masquerade® - Bloodlines™ 2

game.shortDescription: 엘더 뱀파이어가 되어 전쟁의 긴장감이 감도는 현대 시애틀을 누비세요. 막강한 영향력을 지닌 인물들을 만나고, 동맹을 맺고, 지배자와 도시의 새로운 모습을 내 손으로 정하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the Nomad — an elder vampire awakening from a century-long slumber, new to the modern nights. Trapped in your Blood is a stranger’s voice. This entity, a vampire detective known as Fabien, will be your guide to 21st-century Seattle.

reviewHighlights.text: 20 Years of waiting and in the end, arguing with a Stop Sign seems more enjoyable. I am so disappointed.
I have been waiting for Bloodlines 2 for ages and how I wish I would still be waiting ... Oh man, this is bad. I honestly don’t even know what to say....
